title: Health and Medicine 2
sentences: Ich habe mir beim Sport den
I sprained my ankle during sports.
Do you have strong side effects with this medication?
I have to clean my braces every evening.
I need a sick note for my employer.
The X-ray fortunately shows no fracture.
Do you have a referral from the family doctor?
Mir ist heute Morgen ein bisschen
I feel a bit dizzy this morning.
My gums have been inflamed since yesterday.
We must measure your blood sugar regularly.
Ich mache viel Sport für meine
I do a lot of sports for my health.
Have you signed a living will?
The immune system is often weakened in winter.
Ich habe mir den Finger in der Tür
I jammed my finger in the door.
The healing will take about two weeks.
I am currently suffering from insomnia.
Do you have your vaccination record with you?
muss noch vier Wochen am Bein bleiben.
The cast must stay on the leg for another four weeks.
I have a painful infection in the ear.
You have to drink a lot of fluid during the day.
The nurse has to change the bandage.
The cardiovascular system must be strengthened.
dictionary:
der Knöchel - ankle
die Nebenwirkung - side effect
die Zahnspange - braces
der Notarzt - emergency doctor
die Krankschreibung - sick note
das Röntgenbild - X-ray image
die Überweisung - referral
schwindelig - dizzy
das Zahnfleisch - gums
die Gehirnerschütterung - concussion
der Blutzucker - blood sugar
die Gesundheit - health
die Patientenverfügung - living will / advance directive\ das Immunsystem - immune system
einklemmen - to jam / trap
die Heilung - healing
die Schlaflosigkeit - insomnia
der Impfausweis - vaccination record
der Gips - cast (medical)
die Infektion - infection
die Flüssigkeit - fluid / liquid
der Verband - bandage
das Herz-Kreislauf-System - cardiovascular system
das Vitamin (Pl. Vitamine) - vitamin
die Operation - surgery / operation
